about_the_game:
An ominous dark fog has engulfed the world of Trip Space, unleashing endless hordes of Creepers from the shadows! Only you can stand against the tide. Build powerful contraptions, save cute creatures, and stomp on Creeper heads, whatever it takes to claim Victory.

Tempest Tower redefines Tower Defense with a dynamic blend of classic base-building and electrifying player-driven combat. Explore, plan, and meticulously construct your base during the Build Phase. Execute, adapt, and ruthlessly brawl with hordes of Creepers during the Action Phase. Every level is a thrilling test of strategy and skill.

From lethal turrets that shred enemies at range to trampolines that catapult you across levels, Tempest Tower is packed with crazy contraptions! Personally trigger spike traps to obliterate Creepers en masse, and deploy shield bubbles that bounce damage back at foes, there are countless creative tools available to dominate the battlefield.

Trip Space’s unique flora is your secret weapon! Exploding Bomb-Berries wreak havoc on large clusters of enemies, Bait Bulbs lure Creepers into deadly traps, and Glide Leaves let you soar over vast chasms. Adapt, strategize, and use all the items at your disposal to outwit your enemies.

Forge your path to victory with endless experimentation. Customize your loadout before every level, draft contraptions and upgrades to strengthen your build, strategize with powerful items to create unstoppable combos. Turn hazardous level elements into tools of destruction and continuously refine your tactics. The possibilities are limitless!

Master the intricacies of each level through sharp intuition and relentless trial and error. Strike the perfect balance between building efficient defenses and bolstering your economy to stay ahead. Push your limits with brutal difficulty modifiers and claim the ultimate high score!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Protect your tower from invading Creepers using wild contraptions, powerful upgrades, or maybe just... jump on their heads! Tempest Tower reinvents Tower Defense with a thrilling mix of strategic base-building and engaging player-driven combat! Can you withstand the onslaught and save Trip Space?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
